virtues.name: Courageous
virtues.quote: A moment of valor shines brightest against a backdrop of despair.

virtues.name: Vigorous
virtues.quote: Adversity can foster hope, and resilience.

virtues.name: Focused
virtues.quote: A moment of clarity in the eye of the storm...

virtues.name: Stalwart
virtues.quote: Many fall in the face of chaos; but not this one, not today!
